remarks: Define a builder for sequences by strong recursion, i.e. by computing the value of the n-th element of the sequence from all preceding elements and not just the previous one.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Apr-2019.)
statement:
df-sseq $p |- seqstr = ( m e. _V , f e. _V |-> ( m u. ( lastS o. seq ( # ` m ) ( ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> ( x concat <" ( f ` x ) "> ) ) , ( NN0 X. { ( m concat <" ( f ` m ) "> ) } ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d f m x y $.
